SOD images are now enlarged on high-DPI phones.
Added customizable categories to the Notepad
GUI Overhaul (thanks to Mitchell Liam)

Fixed: Crash selecting examples in Tanaka dict.
Added a What''s New dialog
Kanjipad warning message is now shown only once, in a dialog.
Fixed Radicals overflowing on Archos5.
Automatic Tanaka dictionary download now works correctly.
Fixed broken search from the detail screen.
Fixed random NullPointerExceptions, occuring during a search.
Added the stroke order diagrams.

When downloading a dictionary, a copyright notice and a dictionary homepage is now shown
